name: GOLD-PUMP
description:
GOLD-PUMP
Building system test

#STORAGE - Allows to store resources from pumps and delivers it to the store.

#STORE - Takes the resources from storage and sells it.

#GENERATOR - Turbine that generates power in a set time.

#PUMP - Delivers resources to the storage container.
